nodes.text: Drup II was a gas giant–type planet with five moons. It occupied the second closest orbital position around the binary stars Drup's Star and Drup's Companion in the Drup's Star system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Saijo sector.

Drup II was mentioned in the 1993 sourcebook Wanted by Cracken, written by Louis J. Prosperi for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Drup's Star system, and therefore Drup II, in grid square J-20.
